entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Umiujaq
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:30 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -31.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Umiujaq Airport 12:00 PM EST Monday 06 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -31.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.3 kPa rising
Visibility: 19.3 km
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -45
Dewpoint: -34.3°C
Wind: ESE 22 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 24.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this morning. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 45 this morning and minus 36 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Blizzard. Temperature rising to minus 11 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and blowing snow beginning this evening. Blizzard developing near midnight. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming east 50 gusting to 80 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 11 by morning. Wind chill minus 38 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023
